fields.name: primary_corp_id

fields.description: Last modified date and time.

fields.description: Indicates if the product is sold on website by weight or by piece (each).
fields.name: is_weight_variable_on_webcart

fields.description: Product description.

fields.description: Indicates if the product is sold from shop by weight or by piece (each).

fields.description: Indicates if the product can be replenished (purchased) by weight or by piece (each).

fields.description: Identify that the product can't be picked for customer order even if it has positive stock.

fields.description: List of all barcodes, which can be applied for the exact product.
fields.name: barcodes

fields.name: image

fields.description: The recommended maximum time for which products can be stored.
fields.name: shelf_life

fields.description: The recommended threshold in days between the item’s expiration date and when it is no longer allowed to be picked for a customer order.
fields.name: min_remaining_shelf_life

fields.description: Bulk items are not pushed into OSR.
fields.name: is_bulk

fields.description: Everything that will lose the form and structure when placed under heavy products.
fields.name: is_crushable

fields.description: Hazardous are items that can become an operations or safety risk if stored in the OSR.
fields.name: is_hazardous

fields.description: Everything that will crush other products and can’t be stacked.
fields.name: is_heavy

fields.name: is_raw

fields.description: Designation of CHEM and FOOD items.

fields.description: Mid-temperature chilled area (~45-50F instead of 35F).
fields.name: is_specific_chilled

fields.description: Fragile items.
fields.name: is_glass_packaged

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item requires strictly vertical storage.
fields.name: is_vertical

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item can be placed on top of another item.
fields.name: is_stackable

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item has to be stored by cases only.
fields.name: is_case_storage

fields.description: Some items require additional bagging at the picking station.
fields.name: is_requires_plastic_bag
